settings.heading: Download. Find Play. Track. Connect.
settings.description: Join a thriving tennis community on the go! Find local matches and events, follow players you know, and track your progress—all from your phone. Download now and start playing!

settings.heading: Find play
settings.list: Discover matches, leagues, events, and local players tailored to your skill level. Whether you’re a beginner or a pro, connect with others, find the perfect game close to home, and start playing today.

settings.heading: Track your level
settings.list: Measure your skill level with real-time ratings that update every 24 hours. Compare yourself to players worldwide and set goals for improvement. Download the iOS tennis app to Get started.

settings.heading: Find players
settings.list: Easily search for players, from friends and rivals to top competitors. Explore detailed profiles, stats, and rankings in just a few taps.

settings.heading: Tennis rating
settings.list: Trusted by college coaches and players worldwide, our rating updates every 24 hours based on match results. Track your progress in real time and make every match count.

settings.heading: Create play
settings.description: Tap the + button and “Create Play” to set up tennis with friends and players near you. It's that easy with the UTR Sports Tennis App.

settings.heading: Track progress
settings.description: One global platform for everything tennis. Connecting players, coaches, clubs, and federations to grow the game.

settings.heading: Search events
settings.description: Easily find tennis players, tennis events and leagues, team leagues, and clubs near you with the Search Events feature.

settings.heading: NEW Tennis App Features
settings.list: Communities & Groups: Newly located in the center of your homepage under “Communities”, Groups are a place to connect with others in your tennis communities.
settings.list2: Follow Friends & New Home Feed: Connect with other tennis players and share updates to build communities and friendships. See all activities, comments, and media from those you follow, including your groups.
settings.list3: Notification Center: Stay up-to-date on activities and actionable updates related to the people and groups you follow with a bell icon anchored at the top right of your home screen.

settings.heading: UTR Sports iOS Tennis APP
settings.description: The free UTR Sports iOS tennis app makes it easy to get on the court.
settings.paragrap-title: It’s easier than ever to enjoy more tennis and pickleball and connect with players near you on the UTR Sports app.

settings.heading: Who can download the app?
settings.row_content: The app is available in the App Store for iPhone users.

settings.heading: What are the benefits of the app to tennis players?
settings.row_content:
The UTR Sports mobile tennis app offers tennis players several key benefits:

1. Find Matches Easily: Quickly discover local matches, events, and players at your skill level.

2. Accurate Skill Tracking: Track your rating accurately with the industry-leading UTR Rating system.

3. Personalized Play: Enjoy tailored recommendations for matches and tournaments based on your skill level and preferences.

4. Progress Insights: Get detailed analytics on your game performance to identify areas for improvement.

5. Join Competitive Events: Easily register for tournaments, leagues, and flex play opportunities in your area.

6. Community Connection: Connect with other players, join clubs, and build your tennis network effortlessly.

Overall, the UTR Sports App helps tennis players of all levels improve their game, find suitable opponents, and enjoy tennis more than ever before.

settings.heading: Is the UTR Sports app free?
settings.row_content: You can download and sign up for the app completely free. For additional benefits, consider our Power Subscription, which unlocks advanced features designed to help you easily find matches, track your skill level, and get more enjoyment out of your game.

settings.heading: Who’s the app for?
settings.row_content: Everyone! The UTR Sports mobile tennis app streamlines the steps to get you on the court and competing with players is your level. Tennis will be at your fingertips—improve, connect, and enjoy the game.

settings.heading: How can providers utilize the app?
settings.row_content: The app is a great way to communicate with your players via the Messaging tool. We recommend all Providers download the app so they can review how their clubs and events look to players. Providers cannot manage/create/edit events on the app - stick to UTRSports.net for that.

settings.heading: How do I register for a tennis event?
settings.row_content: Select what you are searching for: tennis tournaments, flex tennis leagues, etc. You can then narrow down your search by location, date range, event series, type, Verified Events, Prize Money, and more.

settings.heading: What is a UTR Rating? Why should I have one?
settings.row_content:
A UTR Tennis Rating is a number that provides a real and accurate measurement of skill level. A player’s UTR Rating is a number between 1.00 and 16.50. 

One match result is all it takes to receive a projected UTR Rating. After approximately five matches, the rating becomes fully reliable. As matches are played and entered into the system, a player’s UTR Rating will increase or decrease over time to reflect their current skill level.

Watch the explainer video here.

settings.heading: How is the UTR Rating calculated?
settings.row_content:
For each match, the algorithm calculates a match rating and a match weight for each player. A player’s UTR Rating is the weighted average of up to 30 of their most recent match ratings. Only matches within the last 12 months count toward a player’s UTR Rating.

Read detailed explanation here.

settings.heading: What's the best way to improve my UTR Rating?
settings.row_content:
Play Well.
Performing well in matches is the easiest way to improve your UTR Rating. If the match is out of hand, don’t give up! It does not matter whether you play higher- or lower-rated opponents; you can improve your UTR Rating either way by winning more games than expected.

Play Often.
The more matches you play, the quicker your UTR Rating will reflect your current form. The algorithm is especially accurate for those who play often against a variety of opponents rated above and below you.

Be Patient.
Since your UTR Rating is a rolling weighted average, the effect of new results is slightly lagged. Your UTR Rating may not fully reflect a recent outcome right away, but it will over time.

Watch the video here.
